title: Pieces Kindle Edition
description: Lyman Blackmore’s prosperous casino affords him the luxury of a Tudor mansion. The story follows him through San Francisco (and beyond), from the sixties to the nineties. He inhabits a world of eccentric characters in the midst of dark suspense, crime drama and occult paranormal. Read PIECES to find surprises that lurk in shadowy corners; but you’ll need to hold tight around the turning twists and don’t be afraid of the dark! PICKER is another great novel by Chad Schimke. Read it today!
author: Chad Schimke
